subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After avoiding a suspension for biting a Bruin’s fingers in Game 1, Alexandre Burrows scored twice in Game 2, ending the game in overtime and giving Vancouver a 2-0 lead in the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: After avoiding a suspension for biting a Bruin’s fingers in Game 1, Alexandre Burrows scored twice in Game 2, ending the game in overtime and giving Vancouver a 2-0 lead in the Stanley Cup finals.
